high_descs:
Turn right go straight turn left go to the bedroom
Pick the paper roll from the bed.
Turn around and walk back to the lamp table
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a paper roll by the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and move towards the bed
Pick the toilet paper from the bed
Turn right towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: switch on the desk lamp to view the toilet paper

high_descs:
turn around go straight and turn left to reach the bed 
take on the toilet paper
turn right and walk to the lamp in the corner.
turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a toilet paper by the light of a tall lamp.
